snippet: The American team took an 8-4 lead in the first day of the Walker Cup as Englishman Matthew Fitzpatrick, the United States Amateur champion, split his matches.
abstract: American team takes 8-4 lead in first day of golf's Walker Cup; British phenom Matthew Fitzpatrick, United States Amateur champion and freshman at Northwestern, splits his matches.
lead_paragraph: The American team took an 8-4 lead in the first day of the Walker Cup as Englishman Matthew Fitzpatrick, the United States Amateur champion, split his matches.

headline.main: British Phenom Is Ready for Change in Coursework
headline.print_headline: British Phenom Is Ready for Change in Coursework
